column2: Hitches with F-35 logistics won't delay summer launch: Lockheed executive WASHINGTON Lockheed Martin Corp said on Monday it is working to resolve "relatively minor" issues with a portable version of the F-35 fighter jet's automated logistics system
column3: but the problems should not impede a Marine Corp milestone this summer.
